topics.body:
Oh apparently the Russian law against homosexuality was a bit of a crock. It just prohibited homosexual material being shown to kids.
The lawmakers said they did not care what homosexuals did in their homes.

I realize Russia is still not a great place for gays but still...

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/530eb1df63687255ba910000#post_530eb1df63687255ba910000
But there is still a major legal gray zone in this matter. They can easily warp the cases against homosexuals. Also, there is no protection for people who experience homophobic violence.
